Title: Herbert, Defeated
Description: Interrogate Herbert after winning the fight.

Stages.Text: herbert:"Ughhhh....". Herbert moans semi-conscious on the ground of his office. If your going to get that info nows the time!

Choices.Text: Tell me what I want to know! (POWER=2)

Stages.Text: Herbert stares blankly, awaiting your words.

Choices.Text: Tell me about the cameras you installed on the colleges dime herbie....
Have you noticed here out of ordinary?

Stages.Text: "Master, I was born this way. My mommy calls me her little boy blue....I used to live with her but I moved so I could be closer to work. You never know when the Security Chief Herbert will be needed, master!" The dim witted super says proudly.

"Me and the maintenance guys thought we might be able to catch some sweet action of the girls around here. We put them in every locker room classroom and office in the school. Me and the guys sell passwords to watch the cam show. The people really like it, the girls are very interesting. I mean who knows If any of these young ladies we have caught on camera might turn out to be... Maybe a lawyer, doctor, police officer,.......Justice Force........"

"Ahhh so your trying to run a little black mail scheme. Very nice...... Well continue your little project... But know I will also be using the feed for my own surveillance so know I am watching you at all times."

"Yes master...."

"Besides my mind being taken over by a mad scientist..... Nope all is pretty quite, master... We do get the occasional \"super\" attack but never anything too exciting."

"Well keep a look out for potential recruits."

"Yes master..."
"Yes master..." Herbert mumbles, waiting for your next command.
